casebody.data:
SANDHILL AMUSEMENTS, INC., et al.
v.
SHERIFF OF ONSLOW COUNTY, et al. 363A14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 13, 2017 Mr. S. C. Kitchen, Attorney at Law, for Miller, Hans J. (in his official capacity) Mr. George B. Hyler, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheville, Mr. Stephen P. Agan, Attorney at Law, for Gift Surplus, LLC Mr. Michael A. Grace, Attorney at Law, Mr. Christopher R. Clifton, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Ms. Elizabeth Brooks Scherer, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Mr. Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Sandhill Amusements, Inc. Mr. Hal F. Askins, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ms. J. Joy Strickland, Assistant Attorney General, for Senter, Mark J. (Branch Head) (in his official capacity) Mr. Sean F. Perrin, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Mr. James R. Morgan, Jr., Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Sheriff of Onslow County, North Carolina, et al The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of October 2017 by Plaintiffs for Temporary Stay: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of November 2017." Ervin, J. recused
